title: The History of Totalitarianism
brief_description: Images are flashed in rapid succession of tyrants, artefacts and symbols of oppression from the days of Cheops to the present, to portray a quick history of man’s oppression of man. A musical score of contrasting rhythms underscores the philosophical message. Without narration.
